hero-text: Experience the ultimate enduro adventure in the breathtaking mountains of Bosnia and Herzegovina. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced rider – we offer unforgettable tours through pristine nature and extreme off-road trails.
app_title: Enduro Touren in Bosnien | Enduro Drift Bosnien - Entdecken Sie das Abenteuer!
about_p2: If you want to run away from stress, escape from everyday life or you simply want top Enduro vacation for body and soul with Enduro drift Bosnian you are in the right place.
about_p3: Natural beauties of mountain landscape and intact nature gives you heaven on Earth. We are located in central part of Bosnia and Herzegovinia. Size of Central Bosnia is over 3000 km2. Area is filled with streams, mountain rivers, lakes, spacious fields and forests. Gornji Vakuf - Uskoplje is small quiet town with about 10000 residents, 2,5 hours away from Sarajevo. Surrounded by mountains up to a 2100 m above sea level.
about_p4: All rides can be adapted to your wishes. We are here for you.
tour1_description: This tour is for experienced riders looking for a true adrenaline adventure.
tour1_detail4: 🚗 Transport from and to the airport: 70€
tour1_detail5: ❌ Not included: Dinner in the city

best_title: THE BEST ENDURO TOURS IN BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA
best_p1: Enduro Drift is the leading company for enduro tours in Bosnia and Herzegovina because we offer high quality and first class service in the entire process of organizing your tour.
best_p2: We focus on the right attitude towards everyone who wants or learns to ride motorcycles and is trying for the first time, towards people with great experience who can overcome even the most difficult obstacles in the forest.
best_p3: We are motivated and ready to deal with any challenge along the way. Quality is very important to us. That is why our company is so famous.
best_p4: We think positively and give all our love, passion and energy to create your perfect stay!
best_p5: Combined with the warm climate during the hot months, fresh air and breathtaking scenery, Gornji Vakuf - Uskoplje is an extremely attractive place for ENDURO tours!
best_p6: - Prokoško Lake is located on the mountain Vranica, Bosnia and Herzegovina and is of glacial origin. It is located at 1636 meters above sea level. It is 32 km away from Gornji Vakuf - Uskoplje. In the wider area of the lake are endemic species of flora and fauna.
best_p7: - Vranica is the most famous ore mountain in BiH, between the towns of Uskoplje in the west and Fojnica in the east. The highest peak of Vranica is Nadkrstac at 2112 meters above sea level. It is a gentle mountain, with plenty of pastures and surface waters. Prokoško Lake is located on it. Many springs can be seen on Vranica (Vrbas, Kozičke rike, Sikirski potok), many waterfalls (Ždrimački slap, Kozički slap) and many different caves and pits.
ramsko: Ramsko Lake is an artificial reservoir on the Rama River in Prozor-Rama, in the north of Herzegovina. The lake is often considered one of the most beautiful lakes in Europe. It was created in 1968. Its maximum length is 12 kilometers, with a surface area of approximately 1,500 hectares and a maximum depth of around 95 meters, while water level fluctuations can reach up to 55 meters.
best_lokacija: Our location is Gornji Vakuf - Uskoplje
hotel: Motel Saraj, in its beautiful setting, offers the most affordable accommodation prices in the Gornji Vakuf area. Due to its location, Motel Saraj is the perfect place for hiking, winter vacations, and relaxation in nature on Mount Vranica.
moto_p1: We love our bikes. Not only do they look great but also behave so.
moto_p2: The new 2019 BETA models are light and easy to handle. They are also built with powerful engines that are reliable. These are great for handling and are designed for trails
moto_p3: As you may have heard, they are the so called „READY TO RACE“.
apply_title: What you need to do to book enduro tour?
apply_p1: Fill in the Reservation form below and send it to us.
apply_p2: We will send you an email with all details and confirm availability so you’ll be able to start booking your flights.
apply_p3: As soon as are be ready with flights timetable send it to us for final confirmation.
apply_p4: Within a few hours we will send you an invoice for Reservation Deposit of 100 euro (via PayPal or our bank account), the rest of Tour price is payable upon your arrival to Bosnia and Herzegovina.
apply_p5: After receiving of the Reservation Deposit, we will send you a confirmation of your booking.
apply_p6: We look forward to welcoming you on our enduro tour!
apply_p7: Enduro tour through the breathtaking landscapes of Bosnia!
error_message: There was an error with your registration.
rules: 🏍️ Make sure your bike is ready for the tour
🩹 A small first aid kit is required
⏳ Do not search for the guide, he will come back to you
🚦 Follow traffic signs and respect the traffic
⛽ Your bike must have a full tank, enough for 100 km per day
💧 Bring at least 1.5 liters of water
🛠️ Take metal glue to secure covers
🛞 If you ride with tubes, bring a spare tube and a pump
🛑 Bring a spare brake and clutch lever
⚠️ If you do not follow our company rules, any required assistance will be charged extra
gang: If you arrive without enduro gear, you don't have to worry. We have provided the right equipment for you in all possible sizes. The equipment available to you includes helmets, boots, gloves, knee, chest, and elbow protectors. All equipment has been thoroughly cleaned and is available to our guests free of charge.
gang6: All equipment has been thoroughly cleaned and is available to our guests **free of charge**.
gastebuch_p: Leave a message and share your experiences with us!
kontakt_p: Let us know how we can help you!
termine_p: Choose one of the available tours and book your date in advance. Seats are limited – book now and experience the ultimate off-road adventure!
termine_t1: 🚀 Secure your spot for an unforgettable Enduro tour through Bosnia!
termine_p2: 📅 Tour dates and availability can be found below:
seo_home_title: Enduro Drift Bosnien - Offroad Motorcycle Adventures
seo_home_description: Erleben Sie das ultimative Enduro-Abenteuer in den atemberaubenden Bergen von Bosnien und Herzegowina. Egal, ob Sie Anfänger oder erfahrener Fahrer sind – wir bieten unvergessliche Touren durch unberührte Natur und extreme Offroad-Strecken.
